		Question: what currency to take to barbados
		Answer:
answer:
Here is the answer to the question:

The official currency of Barbados is the Barbadian dollar (BBD). It is also sometimes referred to as the "ene" by locals. The Barbadian dollar is not pegged to any particular fiat currency. The BBD has a value of US$1.00. BBD is one of several convertible currencies pegged to the US dollar (USD). As of 2008, 1 USD is equivalent to 2.00 B
